summary: Completed comprehensive testing of UISN Landing Page admin CRUD operations and Event Detail page. All 36 backend API tests passed (20 existing + 16 new CRUD tests). Frontend admin panel fully functional with login, Programs Manager, Events Manager, Stats Manager, and all other tabs working. Event Detail page dynamically loads event data from API. Form submissions (Volunteer, Newsletter) work correctly with success notifications.

success_rate.frontend: 100% - All admin panels, event detail page, and forms working correctly

seed_data_creation: Test data created via CRUD tests - events, announcements, impact stories, opportunities with TEST_ prefix for cleanup
context_for_next_testing_agent: All admin CRUD operations tested via API. Admin panel UI tested via Playwright - login works, all tabs accessible (Programs, Events, News, Opportunities, Stats, Stories, About). Event Detail page at /event/1 shows SnowServes event with dynamic highlights. Volunteer form submission shows success toast. Newsletter signup works.

admin_login.status: PASS - Redirects to homepage, admin panel button visible

admin_panel.access: PASS - Floating button in bottom-right corner

tabs.Programs: PASS - Shows 4 programs with Add/Edit/Delete buttons
tabs.Events: PASS - Events Manager accessible, Add Event button visible
tabs.Stats: PASS - Shows 4 stats with Edit buttons

backend_crud_operations.events: PASS - Create, Update, Delete verified with persistence checks
backend_crud_operations.programs: PASS - 4 default programs, CRUD endpoints functional

event_detail_page.dynamic_highlights: PASS - Parses description for keywords like mental health, community action

form_submissions.volunteer_form: PASS - Form fills correctly, shows success toast on submit
form_submissions.newsletter_signup: PASS - Email input works, subscription successful
